ocean.question: I am big and blue. Fish like to swim in me. What am I?
I have a shell and move very slowly on the sand. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat green plants.
🐌 I am a type of animal.

ocean.question: I swim in the ocean and say 'blub blub'. What am I?
I am a home for many sea creatures on the ocean floor. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I am hard and can be many shapes.
🐡 Fish like to hide in me.

ocean.question: I am a big animal that lives in the ocean and spouts water. What am I?

hints.text: 💦 I can make a big splash!

ocean.question: I am a star that lives in the sea. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I live on the bottom of the ocean.
🖐️ I am shaped like something you see in the sky at night.

ocean.question: I walk sideways on the beach and have big claws. What am I?

hints.text: 🚶 I move in a funny way.
🏖️ You can find me on the sand.

ocean.question: I’m a long, skinny fish that looks like a snake. What am I?

hints.text: 🐍 I don’t have arms or legs.
💧I can swim in and out of rocks.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. What am I?
I float in the ocean and sting if you touch me. What am I?

transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Mommy, Daddy, and you ride in me.

transport.question: I go choo choo! I ride on a track. What am I?

hints.text: 🚂 I'm very long and have many cars.
💨 I can make a loud whistle.

transport.question: I fly in the sky! I have wings. What am I?

hints.text: ☁️ I can fly above the clouds.
🌍 I can take you to faraway places.

transport.question: I float on the water! I take you to new lands. What am I?

hints.text: ⚓ I need an anchor to stop.
🛥️ People travel on me across the ocean.

transport.question: You push me with your feet! I have two wheels. What am I?

hints.text: 👧 You can ride me when you are bigger

transport.question: I am like a car but bigger. I can carry many people. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I stop to pick up people.

transport.question: I help you go up high in a building! I'm like a little room. What am I?

hints.text: 🚪 I have a door that opens and closes.
🔼 I can take you to the top floor.

transport.question: I am big and strong, I carry things like diggers to construction sites. What am I?

hints.text: 🧱 I can carry sand and rocks.
🏗️ I take big machines to building places.

transport.question: I am a fast car for emergencies. I make a loud siren noise! What am I?

hints.text: 🚑 I help people who are sick or hurt.

transport.question: I fly high in the sky. I can go to space! What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I go to the moon and stars.
